data.title: Who is Julia Roberts’ low profile husband of 20 years, Daniel Moder?
data.meta_description: Roberts may be known for playing a single woman looking for love in some of Hollywood’s most iconic romantic comedies, but IRL the actress has been married to husband Daniel Moder for decades
data.text:
Julia Roberts may be known for her fictional roles as a single woman finding love in some of Hollywood’s most iconic romantic comedies, but in real life, the actress has been married to her husband Daniel Moder for over two decades.

Although she’s stayed tight lipped about their romance, she does occasionally share snippets of their life together.

At the beginning of February the 56-year-old Pretty Woman star posted a birthday tribute to him on Instagram. “Happy birthday to this amazing man who lights up our world”, she wrote in the caption.

With over half a million likes on the post, fans were clearly excited to get a rare glimpse into her family life via the photo.

We’ve rounded up everything we could find about Julia Roberts’ long-time husband, Danny Moder.

Danny Moder is a cinematographer and camera operator

Like his wife, the LA-born cinematographer also works in showbiz. According to his IMDB page, he’s worked behind the scenes on films and TV shows including Ezra, Flag Day, Dead to Me, Ibiza, and Mr and Mrs Smith, to name a few.

How did Julia Roberts meet her husband?

Per People, Roberts and Moder met in 2001 on the set of The Mexican. They must’ve hit it off right away as the couple tied the knot just one year later in an ultra private ceremony.

Not all Hollywood couples have lasted as long as Roberts and Moder have. So how do they do it? In a 2022 interview with E!, the actress shared her advice. “I always say that same thing and I’m sticking with it,” she said. “It’s making out. Lots of making out.”

Who are Julia Roberts’ kids?

The Notting Hill actress shares three teenage children with 55-year-old Moder.

They welcomed twins Hazel and Phinnaeus in 2004, who are now 19.

Their youngest son Henry is 15.

Who else have Julia Roberts and Donny Moder been married to?

Before finding love with Moder, Roberts was married to American country singer Lyle Lovett from 1993 to 1995, but it seems they ended on good terms. “We remain close and in great support of one another,” they shared in a joint statement in 1995, per InStyle.

Moder meanwhile tied the knot with Argentinian make-up artist Vera Steimberg Moder in 1997, but they called it quits in 2002.
